title: Derive the Lukasiewicz axioms from Nicod's axiom

blocks.name: nic-imp
blocks.content: Inference for ~ nic-mp using ~ nic-ax as major premise. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-idlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ nic-id . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-idlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ nic-id . Inference used by ~ nic-id . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-id
blocks.content: Theorem ~ id expressed with ` -/\ ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-swap
blocks.content: The connector ` -/\ ` is symmetric. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-isw1
blocks.content: Inference version of ~ nic-swap . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-isw2
blocks.content: Inference for swapping nested terms. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-iimp1
blocks.content: Inference version of ~ nic-imp using right-handed term. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-iimp2
blocks.content: Inference version of ~ nic-imp using left-handed term. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-idel
blocks.content: Inference to remove the trailing term. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-ich
blocks.content: Chained inference. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-idbl
blocks.content: Double the terms. Since doubling is the same as negation, this can be viewed as a contraposition inference. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-bijust
blocks.content: Biconditional justification from Nicod's axiom. For nic-* definitions, the biconditional connective is not used. Instead, definitions are made based on this form. ~ nic-bi1 and ~ nic-bi2 are used to convert the definitions into usable theorems about one side of the implication. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-bi1
blocks.content: Inference to extract one side of an implication from a definition. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-bi2
blocks.content: Inference to extract the other side of an implication from a 'biconditional' definition. (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-stdmp
blocks.content: Derive the standard modus ponens from ~ nic-mp . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: nic-luk1
blocks.content: Proof of ~ luk-1 from ~ nic-ax and ~ nic-mp (and definitions ~ nic-dfim and ~ nic-dfneg ). Note that the standard axioms ~ ax-1 , ~ ax-2 , and ~ ax-3 are proved from the Lukasiewicz axioms by theorems ~ ax1 , ~ ax2 , and ~ ax3 . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nic-luk1(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
} = {
  nic-mp(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))), wnan(wi(w0, w1), wnan(wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))))
  nic-ich(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w1)))
  nic-bi2(wi(w0, w1), wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w1)))
  nic-dfim(w0, w1)
  nic-ich(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w1)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wnan(wi(w1, w2), wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2))))
  nic-ich(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w1)), wnan(wi(w1, w2), wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2))), wnan(wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)))))
  nic-idel(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w1)), wnan(wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)))), wnan(hw0, wnan(hw0, hw0)))
  nic-isw2(wnan(w0, wnan(w1, w1)), wnan(wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)))), wnan(hw0, wnan(hw0, hw0)))
  nic-ax(w0, w1, w1, hw0, wnan(w2, w2))
  nic-ich(wnan(wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)))), wnan(wi(w1, w2), wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2))), wnan(wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1)))
  nic-imp(wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2))), wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wnan(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2))))
  nic-idbl(wi(w0, w2), wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)))
  nic-bi1(wnan(w0, wnan(w2, w2)), wi(w0, w2))
  nic-dfim(w0, w2)
  nic-imp(wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wi(w1, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1))
  nic-ich(wi(w1, w2), wnan(wnan(w2, w2), w1), wnan(w1, wnan(w2, w2)))
  nic-bi2(wi(w1, w2), wnan(w1, wnan(w2, w2)))
  nic-dfim(w1, w2)
  nic-swap(w1, wnan(w2, w2))
  nic-bi1(wnan(wi(w1, w2), wnan(wi(w0, w2), wi(w0, w2))), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
  nic-dfim(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))
  nic-bi1(wnan(wi(w0, w1), wnan(wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2))))
  nic-dfim(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))
}

blocks.name: nic-luk2
blocks.content: Proof of ~ luk-2 from ~ nic-ax and ~ nic-mp . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nic-luk2(wff w0) {
  |- wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0)
} = {
  nic-mp(wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0), wnan(wi(wn(w0), w0), wnan(w0, w0)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0))
  nic-isw1(wi(wn(w0), w0), wnan(w0, w0))
  nic-iimp1(wnan(w0, w0), wi(wn(w0), w0), wnan(wn(w0), wnan(w0, w0)), wnan(wn(w0), wnan(w0, w0)))
  nic-bi2(wi(wn(w0), w0), wnan(wn(w0), wnan(w0, w0)))
  nic-dfim(wn(w0), w0)
  nic-isw2(wnan(w0, w0), wn(w0), wnan(w0, w0))
  nic-iimp1(wnan(w0, w0), wnan(wnan(w0, w0), wn(w0)), wnan(wnan(w0, w0), wnan(w0, w0)), wnan(wn(w0), wn(w0)))
  nic-dfneg(w0)
  nic-id(wnan(w0, w0))
  nic-bi1(wnan(wi(wn(w0), w0), wnan(w0, w0)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0))
  nic-dfim(wi(wn(w0), w0), w0)
}

blocks.name: nic-luk3
blocks.content: Proof of ~ luk-3 from ~ nic-ax and ~ nic-mp . (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 18-Nov-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm nic-luk3(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1))
} = {
  nic-mp(wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1)), wnan(w0, wnan(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1)))
  nic-iimp2(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1), wn(w0), wnan(w1, w1))
  nic-bi1(wnan(wn(w0), wnan(w1, w1)), wi(wn(w0), w1))
  nic-dfim(wn(w0), w1)
  nic-iimp1(w0, wn(w0), wnan(w0, w0), wnan(w0, w0))
  nic-bi2(wn(w0), wnan(w0, w0))
  nic-dfneg(w0)
  nic-id(w0)
  nic-bi1(wnan(w0, wnan(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wn(w0), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1)))
  nic-dfim(w0, wi(wn(w0), w1))
}
